text: Emus hirtus is a species of rove beetle native to Southern and Central Europe. It is attracted to cow and horse manure.http://www.faunaeur.org/full_results.php?id=260975 ==References== Category:Staphylininae Category:Beetles of Europe Category:Beetles described in 1758 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Emus hirtus
